description: A cup or other decorative object awarded as a prize for a victory or success.
A thing given as a reward to the winner of a competition
A flat, thin piece of metal or wood with writing on it, used as a memorial or for decoration.
A small bowl-shaped container for drinking from, typically having a handle.
A broad piece of metal or another suitable material, held by straps or a handle attached on one side, used as a protection against blows or missiles.
A long, narrow strip of fabric, used for tying something or for decoration.
